columns.name: log_group_name
columns.description: The name of the log group to which this event belongs.

columns.name: log_stream_name
columns.description: The name of the log stream to which this event belongs.

columns.name: timestamp
columns.description: The time when the event occurred.

columns.name: ingestion_time
columns.description: The time when the event was ingested.

columns.name: message
columns.description: The data contained in the log event.

columns.name: message_json
columns.description: The data contained in the log event in json format. Only if data is valid json string.
